description: Bring in potential start-up ideas, & build on the idea to test feasibility and necessity of the idea. After a certain period of time, applications will be screened, based on a variety of factors.
This phase supports the establishment & growth of your start-up idea, & we provide key mentorship that you require.
From design to planning for functional production issues, Design Enablement takes a human-centered approach to solving business challenges while creating a positive experience for end-users.
In this phase, You will be pitching your ideas and You can request the fund required for your concept and MaDeIt will provide you the seed funding to your company.
Itâ€™s the process in which your prototype will be refined and will be made into a product which ultimately the end user will receive.
At this stage, the incubation process will be complete and your company will be in a position to provide a viable and scalable business.
